question_text: Which two steps should be taken when troubleshooting a power supply with no signs of activity? (Select two)
answer_options: Check if the power strip is turned on
Ensure the rear switch on the power supply is set to ON
correct_answer: Check if the power strip is turned on
Ensure the rear switch on the power supply is set to ON
explanation: Basic checks like verifying power input and switch settings should be done before advanced troubleshooting begins.
